column2: Job Role:  Java & Python Developer Exp:  5+ Yrs Location:  Mumbai, Chennai, Bangalore, Hyderabad, Pune Work Mode:  WFO Job Duties & Responsibilities Grasp the business domain and the database structure of the respective module Decode the business requirements into technical requirements Design, code, unit test and debug the Java code Complete code development to ensure product releases are achieved on time Follow coding best practices, write clean modular code & maintain optimal code quality Code regression testing and fix any bugs identified during the testing cycle Being part of the Scrum Team, adhere/follow the Scrum practices as guided by the Scrum Master Collaborate with SME, Product Managers and other members of the project team in requirements specification and detailed engineering analysis. Experience Min. 4 yrs to max of 6 yrs experience in Software development in  java ecosystem Min. 2 yrs of experience in working with  Spring boot. Skillset Proven skills in Java, Spring MVC, Spring boot, Spring, Hibernate / JPA, Spring AOP, Spring Security, RESTful webservices, Java Script, jQuery, Ant, Maven, Log4J. Expertise in Spring Batch, PL/SQL, Drools, RabbitMQ, Jasper Server, Camunda /jBPM will be added advantage Experience with test-driven development. Exposure to Agile Scrum methodologies Work experience with  Python programming Work experience in SVN / any equivalent version control system Knowledge of CI/CD systems, preferably Jenkins Possess English speaking/reading/writing skills Added Advantages Prior experience on any Enterprise product development with geographically dispersed teams.

column2: Job Role:  Java Technical Lead Exp:  10 to 15 Yrs Notice Period:  Immediate to 30 Days Skills:  Java Tech Lead, Angular, Airline domain, Large scale designs, oops Concept, Solid Priniciples, Java 8, Micro services, Web Applications, Kafka   Job Duties & Responsibilities Lead technical design, development and delivery of the product  Lead, guide and mentor the development team Write technical documents  high-level design document, developer guidelines, data models, etc. Recommend technical solutions and best practices  Decode the business requirements into technical requirements Do Code review of your peers/teammates and constantly upskill your team Do code coverage in tools like SonarQube and ensure optimal code quality Grasp the business domain and the database structure of the respective module Design, code, unit test and debug the Java code Design & develop microservices Follow coding best practices, write clean modular code & maintain optimal code quality Being part of the Scrum Team, adhere/follow the Scrum practices as guided by the Scrum Master Collaborate with SME, Product Managers and other members of the project team in requirements specification and detailed engineering analysis. Experience Overall Min. 10 yrs of strong experience in software development in Java ecosystem Min. 4 Yrs of experience in mentoring/leading a team of software developers Skillset Technical In-depth understanding of OO concepts and SOLID principles  Strong experience in object-oriented design and development  Hands on experience in Java 8 or above  Experience in Microservice Architecture Designed and developed web applications using Spring framework - preferably Spring Boot  Experience in developing REST services using Spring framework  Experience in Hibernate - JPA Annotations  Must have experience in implementing  messaging architecture like KAFKA. Knowledge in unit testing frameworks  preferably JUnit  Good understanding of RDBMS concepts and experience in PL/SQL Knowledge in continuous integration and continuous deployment systems  Git version control system  Knowledge of test cycles in software development Passionate about writing clean, modular and unit testable code Management Must have worked on a large-scale product development effort and has experience working with geographically dispersed teams.  Strong knowledge in Agile methodologies  Proven skills in conflict management Effective spoken and written communication Added Advantages Experience in Angular or equivalent UI Frameworks Monitoring and tuning application servers  Exposure to ETL tools DevOps using Jenkins Working in Linux systems

column2: Specific responsibilities include: Automation of test procedures using python. Should perform or able to Review System level ARP4754A compliant System level testing Perform Requirements Management in DOORS Tests and validates to ensure system designs meet operational and functional requirements Skills Required: Very good expertise in python scripting and debugging. Good experience in C++ development and debugging.  Good knowledge in Flight Management Systems (FMS) Good understanding of ARP4754A standards is mandatory Systems testing knowledge is mandatory Hands on Experience on IBM Rational DOORS in Requirements Management is required Experience in test setup, test development, execution, conducting tests in a lab or production environment Qualifications: Bachelors Engineering degree, Preferably Computer Science Engineering with upto 6-9 years / Master's degree, with upto 5-8 years' related work experience, or an equivalent combination of education and experience.  BCT Consulting Hiring for system engineer_Bangalore Interested Candidate's Share resume to muthukumar.m@bct-consulting.com
